requirements.summary: Add responsive marketing site structure with persistent header/footer and routes for Home, Collections, About, Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: Header includes brand logo/name and nav links to Home, Collections, About, Contact on desktop and a mobile-friendly menu on small screens.
Footer includes at least: copyright, social links (placeholders), and a short brand tagline.
All pages are responsive and usable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Routes or page views exist for Home, Collections, About, and Contact and are reachable via navigation.

file_operations.description: Create the app shell with client-side routing (Home, Collections, About, Contact) and wrap all routes in a persistent SiteLayout (header/footer).
Implement a layout component that renders Header, main content container, and Footer consistently across all pages.

Create a responsive header with brand logo/name, desktop nav, and a mobile menu. Use the shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Sheet/Drawer, Navigation patterns) to support responsive navigation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a footer with copyright, placeholder social links, and a short brand tagline; ensure responsive spacing/typography.
Create the Home page route view and wire it into the router (rendered via App routes).
Create the Collections page route view and wire it into the router (rendered via App routes).
Create the About page route view and wire it into the router (rendered via App routes).
Create the Contact page route view and wire it into the router (rendered via App routes).

requirements.summary: Build Home page sections: hero with CTA, featured grid, and brand values/USP section.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page has a hero section with a headline, short subtext, and a prominent CTA button that navigates to Collections.
Home page includes a featured products/collections section with at least 6 items displayed in a grid.
Home page includes a brand values/USP section with 3–4 concise points.

file_operations.description: Implement hero banner (headline, subtext, CTA to Collections), featured section (6 items grid from in-app dataset), and values/USP section (3–4 points). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card) for CTAs and featured tiles; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a simple in-app product/collection dataset that can power featured items on Home and the full grid on Collections (no backend).

requirements.summary: Implement Collections product grid with product details view and a client-side cart indicator with session persistence.
acceptanceCriteria: Collections page shows a grid of products with image, name, and price.
Selecting a product opens a detail view with larger image, description, price, and selectable size options.
An Add to Cart action exists and updates a client-side cart indicator (e.g., count in header).
Cart state persists at least for the current session (e.g., local state; persistence optional).

file_operations.description: Render a browsable product grid from the in-app dataset and open a Product Details view (modal or route-level panel) on selection. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card for tiles, Dialog for details modal, Button for actions) to support the UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable product grid component that displays image, name, and price and triggers selection for details view.

Create a product details modal component showing larger image, description, price, selectable sizes, and Add to Cart. Use shadcn-ui Dialog/Select or ToggleGroup-style components as appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement a Cart context/provider with add-to-cart behavior and session persistence (e.g., sessionStorage) to retain cart state across refreshes in the same session.
Add a hook to access cart state/actions (items count, add/remove if needed) from components without prop drilling.
Display a cart indicator (count) in the header that updates when Add to Cart is used. Use shadcn-ui Badge/Button patterns if available; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire CartProvider at an appropriate level so header and pages can access cart state (app-wide).

requirements.summary: Create a Contact page with a validated contact form and clear client-side success state (no backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields: name, email, message.
Client-side validation prevents submission with empty fields and invalid email format.
On submit, user sees a success confirmation state (and the app does not crash or navigate unexpectedly).

file_operations.description: Implement the contact form (name, email, message), client-side validation (required fields + email format), and an on-screen success confirmation state. Use shadcn-ui Form/Input/Textarea/Button components as available; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add small shared validation helpers (e.g., email format check, required field helpers) to keep ContactPage logic clean and testable.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive fashion-brand visual theme (colors/typography/spacing/components) consistently across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent design system is evident across buttons, headings, cards, and spacing.
Theme avoids default-looking styling and is applied uniformly across Home, Collections, About, and Contact.
No blue/purple-dominant palette is used unless required by assets.

file_operations.description: Define global theme tokens (CSS variables used by Tailwind/shadcn-ui), typography defaults, and base element styles using a neutral fashion palette (e.g., black/cream/stone with a warm accent; avoid blue/purple dominance).
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions as needed to support the brand look (typography scale, spacing, shadows) while keeping shadcn-ui token-driven colors intact.
Apply consistent page container widths, vertical rhythm, and section spacing so all pages share the same layout system.

Align header styling (type scale, link states, hover/focus, spacing) with the global theme. Use shadcn-ui primitives for consistent button/link styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Align footer styling (contrast, spacing, link styles) with the global theme for a cohesive look across pages.

requirements.summary: Add required generated brand visuals as static assets and integrate them into header, Home hero, and at least one additional section.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Logo is displayed in the site header.
Hero image is used in the Home hero section.
At least one additional generated image is used somewhere appropriate (e.g., About or Collections header).

file_operations.description: Add the generated brand logo asset at this exact path/filename for use in the header.
Add the generated hero banner asset at this exact path/filename for use on the Home hero section.
Add the generated lifestyle banner asset at this exact path/filename for use as a supporting banner image (e.g., About section header).
Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header alongside/with the brand name (responsive sizing).
Use frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1920x900.png as the Home hero visual (with readable overlay/text treatment).
Incorporate frontend/public/assets/generated/lifestyle-banner.dim_1600x900.png as a supporting banner/lifestyle image in a suitable layout section (responsive, accessible alt text).
